# Remote Validation Brief Template

## 1. Purpose
- Why the session exists
- Feature / flow under test

## 2. Participants
| Persona | Expertise level | Location / Time zone | Notes |
|---------|-----------------|----------------------|-------|
|         |                 |                      |       |

## 3. Context-of-use assumptions
- Devices, software, environment
- Constraints (time limits, bandwidth, etc.)

## 4. Session Flow (60 min example)
| Segment | Duration | Goals / prompts |
|---------|----------|-----------------|
| Warm-up & consent | 5 min | ... |
| Scenario briefing | 5 min | ... |
| Task block | 35 min | ... |
| Metrics capture | 10 min | SUS, custom Likert, etc. |
| Wrap-up | 5 min | ... |

## 5. Metrics & Success Criteria
| ISO dimension | Metric | Target | Collection method |
|---------------|--------|--------|-------------------|
| Effectiveness |        |        |                   |
| Efficiency    |        |        |                   |
| Satisfaction  |        |        |                   |

## 6. Risks & Mitigations
- Risk 1 → Mitigation
- Risk 2 → Mitigation

## 7. Go / No-Go Rule
- Example: "Ship if 3/4 participants finish under 4 minutes AND SUS ≥ 80."

## 8. Follow-up Actions
- Who reviews recordings
- When to share findings
